mapper.select:
select carrier.* from ent_carrier carrier where carrier.sys_status = 1
and carrier.name like "%${keyword}%"
order by if(isnull(carrier.modified_time),0,carrier.modified_time) desc,carrier.created_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into ent_carrier ( id, name, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( uuid(), #{name}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ent_carrier set name = #{name}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update ent_carrier set sys_status = 0, modifier_id = #{modifier_id}, modified_time = now() where id=#{id}
